version.name: version
version.description: Defaults to current version of module's locale

BasicAuth.description: Basic authentication. Must be formatted as [companyName]+[publicKey]:[privateKey]

ActivityStatusReference.description: Required when notifyType is set to: "Create Activity"

ActivityTypeReference.description: Required when notifyType is set to: "Create Activity"

objects.description: A list of AuditTrailObject to which the text will be applied. List Cannot Be Empty.

AuditTrailObjects.description: A list of AuditTrailObject to which the text will be applied. List Cannot Be Empty.

items.description: For configuration, list of integers (config_recid) or list of strings (deviceIdentifier). For ticket, list of integers (ticket_recid)

AutomateScriptReference.description: Required when notifyType is set to: "Run Connectwise Automate Script"

CalendarReference.description: Required if clientFlag is set to true

CompanyStatusReference.description: Required when notifyType is set to: "Change Company Status"

screenId.description: Can be obtained via ConnectWiseHostedApiScreen report

locationParamId.description: Parameter unique identifier for the Custom Report's Location parameter

departmentParamId.description: Parameter unique identifier for the Custom Report's Department parameter

territoryParamId.description: Parameter unique identifier for the Custom Report's Terriroty parameter

companyParamId.description: Parameter unique identifier for the Custom Report's Company parameter

memberParamId.description: Parameter unique identifier for the Custom Report's Member parameter

startDateParamId.description: Parameter unique identifier for the Custom Report's Start Date parameter

endDateParamId.description: Parameter unique identifier for the Custom Report's End Date parameter

oppTypeParamId.description: Parameter unique identifier for the Custom Report's Opportunity Type parameter

opportunityParamId.description: Parameter unique identifier for the Custom Report's Opportunity parameter

marketingCampaignParamId.description: Parameter unique identifier for the Custom Report's Marketing Campaign parameter

serviceBoardParamId.description: Parameter unique identifier for the Custom Report's Service Board parameter

serviceTypeParamId.description: Parameter unique identifier for the Custom Report's Service Type parameter

serviceStatusParamId.description: Parameter unique identifier for the Custom Report's Service Status parameter

agreementTypeParamId.description: Parameter unique identifier for the Custom Report's Agreement Type parameter

agreementParamId.description: Parameter unique identifier for the Custom Report's Agreement parameter

projectTypeParamId.description: Parameter unique identifier for the Custom Report's Project Type parameter

projectParamId.description: Parameter unique identifier for the Custom Report's Project parameter

workRoleParamId.description: Parameter unique identifier for the Custom Report's Work Role parameter

workTypeParamId.description: Parameter unique identifier for the Custom Report's Work Type parameter

invoiceParamId.description: Parameter unique identifier for the Custom Report's Invoice Type parameter

name.description: Either a caption name or parameter name is required

captionName.description: Either a caption name or parameter name is required

GroupReference.description: Required when notifyType is set to: "Add to Group"

password.description: The password will never be returned in response

canAccessAllRecordsFlag.description: This flag controls whether the integrator can access only the db records it created, or all system records

managedServicesChildingFlag.description: True if integrator is allowed to child configurations

opportunityConversionApiFlag.description: True if the member has access to the Opportunity Conversion Api

configurationChildlingFlag.description: True if integrator is allowed to child configurations

password.description: ConditionallyRequired. API Member will get random password generated

licenseClass.description: F = Full Member, A = API Member, C = StreamlineIT Member, X = Subcontractor Member

companyTeam.description: A list of customers for which the member holds a team role

MemberDeactivationCompanyTeam.description: A list of customers for which the member holds a team role

MemberDeactivationKnowledgebaseArticle.description: A list of knowledge base articles that the member is the approver

MemberDeactivationOpportunity.description: A list of the member's currently assigned Opportunities

MemberDeactivationProjectManager.description: A list of Projects that the member is the project manager

MemberDeactivationSalesActivity.description: The List of Activities Assigned to the Member

MemberDeactivationSalesTeam.description: A list of Sales Teams to which the member is assigned

MemberDeactivationServiceTemplate.description: The Service (Ticket) Templates on which the Member is the assignedTo resource

MemberDeactivationWorkflow.description: The Workflows to which the member is assigned

licenseClass.description: F = Full Member, A = API Member, C = StreamlineIT Member, X = Subcontractor Member

NotificationRecipientReference.description: Required when notifyType is set to: "Create Activity", "Send Email", "Add Follower", "Assign Resource", "Close Survey"

OrderStatusReference.description: Required when notifyType is set to: "Change Sales Order Status"

updateMemberTimeZonesFlag.description: If true, all Members time zone will also be set to serverTimeZone. Otherwise, only My Company time zone will be updated.

password.description: Password is only available on response of install request

ProjectStatusReference.description: Required when notifyType is set to: "Change Project Status"

reportingPassword.description: To blank out the password, enter an empty string here.

ServiceTemplateReference.description: Required when notifyType is set to: "Create a Service Ticket"

id.description: Unique identifier of the SSO Configuration

inactiveFlag.description: Whether the SSO configuration is not active

samlSignInUrl.description: Sign in url for the SAML Identity Provider

samlIdpCertificate.description: Public certificate for Identity Provider signatures

samlCertificateName.description: Name of the SAML certificate. Metadata on SAML_Idp_Certificate

samlCertificateIssuedTo.description: Who the SAML certificate was issued to. Metadata on SAML_Idp_Certificate

samlCertificateThumbprint.description: Thumbprint of the SAML certificate. Metadata on SAML_Idp_Certificate

samlCertificateValidFrom.description: Date when the SAML certificate becomes valid. Metadata on SAML_Idp_Certificate

samlCertificateValidTo.description: Date when the SAML certificate is no longer valid. Metadata on SAML_Idp_Certificate

items.description: The locations where the SAML Idp Configuration is used

clientId.description: Client identity for this configuration of ConnectWise SSO

stsBaseUrl.description: Sign in URL for ConnectWise SSO

stsUserAdminUrl.description: User Admin Url for ConnectWise SSO

TimeZoneReference.description: The system level time zone to which this setup is associated

defaultFlag.description: Identifies the default system time zone setup

TrackReference.description: Required when notifyType is set to: "Attach Track"

id.description: ID of the custom user defined field

podId.description: Id of the Pod where the custom field will be placed

sequenceNumber.description: Must be between 1 and 500.  This defines the order in which the custom fields will appear

helpText.description: Help text to accompany the custom field

numberDecimals.description: Only valid for Number or percent

listViewFlag.description: Denotes that this custom field is included on a list view

buttonUrl.description: Only available with Button Field Type. Required when entryTypeIdentifier is button

dateCreated.description: Date in UTC the custom field was created

UserDefinedFieldReference.description: If your trigger is for custom fields, this will populate with the custom field associated with the option

activateFlag.description: Batches can not be turned on until after the workflow is created and it has atleast one event associated with it

batchFrequencyUnit.description: If not specified, defaults to Minutes. Months is not supported as month length varies

batchSchedule.description: If activateFlag is true, batchSchedule is required

emailRecipient.description: Required when notifyWho is set to: "Email Address"

emailFrom.description: Required when notifyFrom is set to: "Email Address"

subject.description: Required when notifyType is set to: "Create Activity", "Send Email", "Assign Resource"

frequencyUnit.description: Required when exectionTimes is set to MultipleTimes or Continuously

frequencyOfExecution.description: Required when exectionTimes is set to MultipleTimes or Continuously

maxNumberOfExecution.description: Required when exectionTimes is set to MultipleTimes

executionTime.description: Defaults to Once when not specified

isSetupFlag.description: If the current action is available because it is already set up. Pertains to integrations such as Automate

externalFlag.description: If the current action effects external objects e.g. integrations or sending an email
